Row.Text: Lyndis, Lady of the Wind, as a [ICON_GREATPERSON] Unique Hero. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Start game with this unit replacing the player's initial warrior. [NEWLINE]Scales with era but typically slightly weaker than the unit(s) of that era. [NEWLINE]Upon death of a Hero, a shrine is constructed in the Capital, this shrine allows the training of another Hero in that city. [NEWLINE]No more than one instance of a specific Hero existing can belong to a Civilization at a time. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Does not enforce a Zone of Control. [NEWLINE]Sacae's 'Call of the Wind' Ability extends to Lyndis.
The legendary blade dropped by Lyndis when she fell in battle. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Her soul is permanently attached to the blade, perhaps she in another life will wield the blade again.

Grants +1 [ICON_Range] Range, enabling use of Lyndis' [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strike. However, after a [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strike Lyndis cannot perform another until the next turn, even if Lyndis has additional attacks.
Grants [ICON_Culture] Culture equal to 40% of the [ICON_Strength] strength of any unit defeated by Lyndis. Grants 40% Experience from all combat.
Enables Lyndis to ignore enemy Zones of Control, move again after combat, and after a [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strike restores Lyndis' [ICON_Movement] Movement to 1 below it's max value.
Grants +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement. Grants bonus +10 [ICON_Strength] strength when initiating against units under 40% [ICON_Damaged] health.
Grants +1 [ICON_Range] Range and enables Lyndis to engage in combat twice in the same turn if [ICON_Movement] Movement permits.
